summary: 1998 CHEVY VENTURE, 77000 MILES, NO WARNING, ENGINE LIGHT CAME ON, PULLED OVER, ENGINE TAPPING & SMOKING.  WALKED 1.2 MILES ON INTERSTATE, 8 MILES TO EXIT, TOOK  RIDE FROM UNKNOWN COUPLE.  HAD VAN TOWED, DIAGNOSED: COLLASPED INTAKE GASKET CAUSED ROD TO GO THROUGH ENGINE.  DEALERSHIP & GM REFUSED TO HELP. REPEATABLE PROBLEM WITH GASKET EASILY LOCATED ON INTERNET, OVERWELMED BY SEVERITY.
